title: 'Apocalypse Now?' with Jordan Greenhall and Akira the Don
description:
Jordan Greenhall was one of the stars of the 'Glitch in the Matrix' documentary, and Akira the Don is also a Rebel Wisdom regular. 

We bring them together for the first time to discuss the collapse, or transformation of civilisation - how 'wholesomeness is the new punk', and more. It jumps around a bit, but there are some real gems.

Join the conversation on the Rebel Wisdom Discord chat: https://discord.gg/RK4MeYW

Read more about what we're doing on http://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/
